sentences.en: An anonymous missive had been pushed under her door.
sentences.cn: 有人在她门底下塞了一封匿名信。

sentences.en: Missive . You send a one - way telepathic message to subject.
sentences.cn: 心灵短讯: 向目标送出一条 单向 的心灵短讯.

sentences.en: Sure, sometimes it's perfectly acceptable to shoot off a short , all lowercase missive to a colleague.
sentences.cn: 诚然, 有时候给某个同事发去一封全是小写字母的简短信件完全可以接受.

sentences.en: The missive remains unwritten and unsent.
sentences.cn: 这件公文未写也未发出去.

words.tran_cn: 公文， 公函；信件，信函
